bike.description: 7005 aluminum double-butted main frame, hydro-formed Kinesium top tube for comfortable portage, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, tapered chainstays, butted seat stays, PressFit 30 BB shell, 34.9mm seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger, single eyelet

components.description: Jamis CX carbon composite fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, post disc brake mounts with integrated carbon cable cradle with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Comp Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Alex ATD490 tubeless-ready disc specific rim, 32H, Formula alloy 6-bolt disc road hubs and 14g stainless steel spokes
SRAM Apex derailleurs for 34.9mm seat tube
SRAM S350 PF30 cross compact double, 46/36T, 170mm (48/51) 172.5mm (54/56) 175mm (58/61)
TRP HYRD cable actuated hydraulic disc brake with 160mm front; 140mm rear rotors and SRAM Apex brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Ritchey Road, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Open with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
